column1: The following metadata describes the plot metrics output by the IntELiMon system
"Metric" is the name of the outputted variable
"Scan Division", "Metric type" and "Voxelized/Point Cloud" describe at what point in the process the metric originates from
Abbreviations: TGI- triangular greenness index, VARI- visible atmospherically resistant index, CWD- coarse woody debris

column2: % of points not classified as ground in strata 1 to 5

% of unreturned non-ground points (true empty space) in strata 1 to 5

Skewness of proportion of occluded and no returns in strata 1 to 5
